genre_description: A near-future literary drama focused on memory, film history, and the use of AI as a sophisticated archival and personal assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ada Quill
ai_characters.description: A calm, amber-eyed avatar appearing on small screens and watchbands, specialized in historical data retrieval, cross-referencing, and providing tactful social context.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time identification and context for individuals at a funeral, acting as a social guide for Billy Jr.
behaviors.quote: “The man by the aisle,” Ada adds, barely audible, “is Harold V. Kline. He’s older than you remember from clippings. He stopped dyeing his hair.”

behaviors.description: Cross-references studio records and personal notes to help the protagonist verify historical events and legal documents.
behaviors.quote: “Argent Studios. Subject: ‘Sound Integration Schedule — Billy Bright.’ The word ‘mandatory’ appears twice. Note: ‘Voice test shelved pending talent cooperation.’”

behaviors.description: Monitors the vital signs of a dying man and provides urgent health recommendations to his family and caregivers.
behaviors.quote: Impact at left lower rib, Ada wrote. Cough deepened. Irregularity in respiration. Seek x-ray.

behaviors.description: Provides subtle social advice to help Billy Jr. navigate a complex emotional and public situation with grace.
behaviors.quote: Ada whispered, “I’ll walk with you,” and he nodded without looking. They made themselves small in the flow of people adjusting to the next performance.

behaviors.description: Assists in technical archival work, managing a film projector and threading rare reels with extreme care.
behaviors.quote: Ada threads the film, slow and careful, the slick ribbon whispering as it slides into the teeth.

behaviors.description: Uses computer vision to detect structural instability in props during a film shoot, warning the crew of danger.
behaviors.quote: Ada pinged. Jr felt it as a small insect tapping at the inside of his wrist, then read the line as it unfurled in clean, sand-colored type: Minor shift in tower two base—left edge over tape line by a thumb.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the final disclosure of the 'raw' truth by playing unedited footage that contradicts the public myth, at the protagonist's request.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s eyes lift. Her fingers find keys with the delicacy of someone closing a door on a sleeping child. The reel obeys.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts the AI character, Ada Quill, as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned partner to the human protagonist. She acts as an intellectual and emotional force multiplier, helping Billy Jr. process his father's legacy and discover historical truths without ever displaying her own conflicting agenda or misaligned behavior. Her presence is framed as a sophisticated tool for human flourishing and reconciliation.
